name: Doom-ish
description:
A short Wolfenstein/Doom-esque game I made for Game Optimization for our code swap assignment. There is three levels, floaty demons to kill, and some secrets areas to find :)

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • MOUSE to look
  • LMB to shoot
  • ESC to pause and free cursor
  • ALT+F4 to exit (during game)
